item.description: Locally produced fresh strawberries are sweet and nutritious sold in 400g containers
item.storage: Refrigerate until consumption or up to one week

item.description: Fresh large avocadoes from Maxico best in smoothies, salads, or on toast
item.storage: Refrigerate until consumption or up to one week

item.description: Fresh California grown eggplants that vary in size and are sold individually
item.storage: Refrigerate until consumption or up to one week

item.description: The zucchini are locally grown, fresh, and healthy. Great in any dish.
item.storage: Keep refrigerated

item.description: Canadian farm raised, no added hormones
item.storage: Refrigerate for no more than two days

item.description: Minally processed beef
item.storage: Keep refrigerated

item.description: 4 mild Italian Johnsville Sausages
item.ingredients: Pork, water, corn syrup and less than 2% of the following: pork broth with natural flavorings, salt, dextrose, spices, natural flavor, extractives of paprika, BHA, propyl gallate, citric acid.
item.storage: Prepare within 3 days of purchase or freeze for up to 30 days.

item.description: Great Value thick sliced naturally smoked bacons
item.ingredients: Pork, water, salt, sugar, sodium phosphate, sodium erythorbate, sodium nitrite, smoke.
item.storage: Prepare within 3 days of purchase or freeze for up to 30 days.

item.description: Quebon 2% M.F. Partially Skimmed Milk is a locally produced, vitamin D3 fortified milk drink.
Quebon 10% M.F. Coffee Cream is a locally produced dairy product with a smooth texture that enhances coffee or used for cooking
item.ingredients: Milk, cream, vitamin D3, mono- and siglycerides, disodium phosphare, sodium citrate, carrageenan
item.storage: Refrigerate after opening. Refer to Best Before date on package

item.description: Lactantia salted country churned butter is a locally produced, rich and smooth butter, great on a toast or for cooking.
item.storage: Keep refrigerated

item.description: Kraft Shredded Mild Cheddar Cheese is locally produced creamy cheese perfect for cooking
item.ingredients: Cheddar cheese, potato starch, cellulose powder, calcium sulfate, natamycin. Contains: milk
item.storage: Keep refrigirated

item.description: Daily fresh French style baguette
item.ingredients: Flour, Active Dry Yeast, Vegetable Oil, Conservation Agents
item.storage: Store in a cool dry place, eat within 3 days or freeze

item.description: Croissants fresh of the day baked on location
item.ingredients: Flour, Butter, Egg, Active Dry Yeast, Vegetable Oil, Conservation Agents
item.storage: Store in a cool dry place, eat within 3 days or freeze

item.description: Homestyle decadent chocolate chip cookies
item.ingredients: Margarine, Chocolate Chips, Brown Sugar, White Sugar, Eggs, Vanilla, Flour, Baking Soda, Salt
item.storage: Store in a cool dry place, eat within 5 days
Once opened, use within 3 days for better quality.

item.description: Tropicana 100% pure and natural orange juice - no pulp
item.storage: Once opened, keep refrigerated.

item.description: Coca-Cola classic soft drink
item.ingredients: Carbonated water, sugar/glucose-fructose, caramel colour, phosphoric acid, natural flavour, caffeine
item.storage: Once opened, keep refrigerated. Serve ice cold for maximum refreshment.

item.description: 4% Alcohol Beer
item.ingredients: Water, Barley Malt, Corn Syrup(Dextrose), Yeast, Hop Extract
item.storage: Keep refrigerated.

item.description: Imported organic edamame. Can be eaten as snack.
item.storage: Store in fridge for a week or freeze

item.description: Organically grown bitter melon, free of pesticides
